CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Innovative Eyewear Inc is engaged in developing and selling eyeglasses and sunglasses, which are designed to allow the customers to remain connected to their digital lives, while also offering prescription eyewear and sun protection. Its products Lucyd Lyte glasses enable the wearer to listen to music, take and make calls, and use voice assistants to perform many common smartphone tasks hands-free.
